flawed_nl_solution:
Yes RSVP responses are 200 x 83% = <<200*83*0.01=166.0>>166.0 guests.
No RSVP responses are 200 x 9% = <<200*9*0.01=18.0>>18.0 guests.
Guests who responded are 166.0 + 18.0 = <<166.0+18.0=184.0>>184.0.
Guests who did not respond at all are 200 - 184.0 = <<200-184.0=61.0>>61.0.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16.0, not 61.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
